price: 48. „Joks nuovargio jausmas nepalies jų, nei jie (kada nors) bus paprašyti palikti jį.“
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
